events.name: RHoK Global December 2012: Trento, Italy
events.about:
Join us on December 1-2, 2012 and help us build solutions for a better world.

Throughout the weekend, we will be coding around problems related to ICT for development in areas such as food logistics and waste, social accountability, disaster management, and more. 

RHoK has been working with subject matter experts around the world to develop problem statements addressing global issues. These problem statements will be the hacking challenges thrown out to the developers at the RHoK hackathon. See those statements as they develop at http://www.rhok.org 

At the end of the weekend, we’ll invite you to share your RHoK application with the group with the potential to win prizes and see your work put to use on the ground to save lives and alleviate suffering. 

What Do I Need? We will provide facilities, power, food and refreshments to help you write your application.Just bring your laptop, ideas, and enthusiasm to complete the mix.

Check out how to reach us at: http://www.fbk.eu/getting/scientific_hub

More information about RHoK Trento available at: http://ict4g.github.com/rhok-trento/ (will open in a new window)

Photos from the previous editions http://www.flickr.com/photos/rhoktrento (will open in a new window) 

- The RHoK Team at FBK

events.name: Trento Startup Weekend
events.about: Startup Weekend is an intense 54 hour event which focuses on building a web or mobile application which could form the basis of a credible business over the course of a weekend. The weekend brings together people with different skillsets - primarily software developers, graphics designers and business people - to build applications and develop a commercial case around them.
